title: Eastern Europe: an introduction
brief_description: A geographic and historical survey of Poland, Czechoslovakia, Yugoslavia, Bulgaria, Rumania, Hungary and Albania; the agriculture, industry and important cities of this area under communist domination. A variety of landforms and diverse cultural backgrounds contribute to a wide variation of human use and living standards.
